name: Starkid Fighters
description:
Starkid Fighters is a fast-paced 3D vectorial shooter set in cyberspace.

You can currently battle against waves of increasingly intelligent and strange enemies while slowly improving your ship and strategy.

More is to come. A lot more.

(NOTE: If the HTML version doesn't work, try switching to Firefox or simply downloading a version compatible with your OS below)
